subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh was one of baseball’s feel-good stories for much of the season, moving as many as 16 games over .500 on Aug. 8, before losing 31 of its next 43 games, including Monday’s loss to the Mets.
snippet: Pittsburgh was one of baseball’s feel-good stories for much of the season, moving as many as 16 games over .500 on Aug. 8, before losing 31 of its next 43 games, including Monday’s loss to the Mets.
